search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SendOwl (sendowl.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SendOwl can be found at: [https://www.sendowl.com/pricing](https://www.sendowl.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Frequently Asked Questions

Pricing
Marketplace
Webspot



What are the new pricing plans?


Each plan is described above along with the limits of each plan type. For example, your plan may have an order limit which means that if you have a great year and your order volume exceeds that limit, your account will be auto-upgraded to the next level - if and when that happens, you will be notified by email letting you know.
Generally speaking, we recommend selecting the smallest plan that fits your needs. Then, as your sales grow, you can upgrade your plan to meet your growing needs or, if you exceed the order and sales limits for your plan, your account will be auto-upgraded. We will email you with full information of those updates.


Why did you change pricing?


This is the first major pricing change in the 15 year history of SendOwl and is being done to bring our pricing in line with the value we provide to our users and allow us to continue investing in providing industry leading products, features and service. With this pricing change, we are still at parity or (meaningfully) below many of our key competitors.


How does your pricing compare to the market?


Please see the comparison list above but, in short, SendOwl is still amazing value and is still cheaper than the majority of the listed alternatives.


What about free orders?


Free orders use the same resources to store files and the same bandwidth to deliver content as paid orders. In other words, free orders count towards your order total in the same way as paid orders.
Test orders made using the Stripe test order configuration will not count towards your order total or sales total.


Will my plan change?


We will automatically assign you the lowest cost new plan for your volume and features. Once plans are “live” on April 24, you can go to your account settings and adjust your plan.


I am on a legacy plan, will I move?


We stopped supporting legacy plans several years ago and we ‘grandfathered’ those plans into SendOwl. However, all merchants will now move to the plan noted above that most closely aligns with their current usage.


Will this impact my existing orders/subscriptions I sell?


In short, no. Your existing products will continue to be available as will your existing subscriptions. Remember that you will be moved to the plan that most closely aligns with your current usage and you will not lose functionality.
